job.title: Data Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description: <p><strong>Job Title:</strong>&nbsp;Data Engineer</p><p><strong>Position Type:</strong> Contract until December 2021 (2.5 Months)</p><p><strong>Location:</strong> 100% remote, no travel, prefer Central or East Coast location since a lot of the team onshore work East Coast.</p><p> </p><p><strong>Primary Skills:</strong> 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure Python, Scala, SQL and/or Databricks hands on experience</p><p> </p><p><strong>Requirements: </strong></p><ul><li>At least 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure.</li><li>Must have python, scala, SQL and/or databricks hands on experience.</li><li>Should be independent worker but collaborate with necessary peers and deliver results incrementally by taking full ownership of tasks.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Daily duties: </strong></p><p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gen 1 to Gen 2 transition</p><p>a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Majority of their data pipelines are using Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 1 which is going to be deprecated by Microsoft</p><p>b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hence they need to migrate this to ADLS Gen 2 version</p><p>c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Approximately, 155 data pipelines will be impacted from an ingestion pov and another 30 pipelines will also need to be updated in Refined data process</p><p><br></p><p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data Quality automation</p><p>a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Today, they have several notebooks and scripts that perform aggregate quality checks for multiple sources</p><p>b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Some of these need to be upgraded to use more current pipeline run information and also needs automation</p><p>c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;They will utilize ADLSg2 to store this metadata for reporting and analysis </p><p><br></p><p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Functions optimization and Vacuum implementation</p><p>a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There are Azure Functions based processes that needs update and optimization as each of them are running independently</p><p>b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Opportunity to modularize some of these functions and as a result reduce overhead on system resources</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
